headline: Broadridge Financial: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
summary: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y. (AP) — Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. BR) on Tuesday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $284.6 million. On a per-share basis, the Lake Success, New York-based company said it had profit of $2.42.

content.title: Broadridge Financial: Fiscal Q2 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: LAKE SUCCESS, N.Y. (AP) — Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. BR) on Tuesday reported fiscal second-quarter earnings of $284.6 million. On a per-share basis, the Lake Success, New York-based company said it had profit of $2.42.

headline: Broadridge raises annual profit forecast on investor communications strength
summary: Fintech firm Broadridge Financial raised its full-year earnings ​forecast and posted a higher ‌second-quarter profit on Tuesday, buoyed by strength ‌in its investor communications business. The firm, one of the largest investor communications and technology services providers in the ⁠U.S., has ‌benefited from increased corporate activity. "Our results reflect strong organic growth ‍of 7%, including strength in investor participation and elevated levels of event-driven activity," ​CEO Tim Gokey said.

headline: Broadridge (NYSE:BR) Delivers Impressive Q4 CY2025
summary: Financial technology provider Broadridge (NYSE:BR) reported revenue ahead of Wall Streets expectations in Q4 CY2025, with sales up 7.8% year on year to $1.71 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.59 per share was 16.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
